Description.Name: Automation
Description.Details: Many of the Argo's Mech Bay systems were only meant to be used with sophisticated Star Leagueâ€“era automation. Bringing that automation even partially back online is a substantial force multiplier to Yang's skills. Enables second Repair bay to work at 100% efficiency.

AssignedCastDescription: This stuff can't do the work for me, but it comes awfully close. You want to speed things up around here, give me the resources to get these machines back online.
